Title: Reunion
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created for television by), Lisa Joy (created for television by), Carly Wray, Jonathan Nolan, Gina Atwater (staff writer), Michael Crichton (based on the film written by)

Plot: Dolores remembers she's been to the outside world; William makes a bold business venture.
